name: Pyramid Classic
description:
Try the best Pyramid Solitaire card game !
Pyramid Solitaire is the one of the most popular card game in the world.

We kept alive the traditions of the classical Pyramid Solitaire that you love so much, giving you the option to spice it up if you want to ! Designed for smartphones and tablets, it includes the following features:

- Winning deals only
- Classical scoring
- Unlimited undo
- Unlimited hints to give you advice on possible moves

Beautiful graphics and sounds to give you the most comfortable experience:
- Sound, music and timer can be turned on and off
- 30 card & 6 background designs available

Simple and handy interface:
- Single tap or drag and drop to move a card
- Left or Right handed mode

Personal stats to keep track of your performance:
- Your statistics for every game type


You will enjoy playing this traditional Pyramid Solitaire for sure.
Download now for unlimited free games !
